body:
imagine arguing on mother fucking nhentai

just fap bro

@dsfargeg
You first, mister hypocrite. What are you doing on a Kiliu work? There's the shota tag in this, what does it make of you? Or are you throwing that shit around because I dissed the gender-fag tag? Seems like the usual twatter folk tactical nonsense of hurling big accusations based on projected emotions in hopes of sticking a social shutdown label on the target and let the brainless herd mentality do the rest. You forgot that this site is nhentai, not ytube or some social media's comment section.
@typical japanese maincharacter you are a pedophile please kill yourself thank you
Hope this gets translated into english soon

First work of kiliu that doesn't do it for me.
Not into that "gender inverted" trap-gay shit like ranman. (still mad at that one episode, which was the first one I saw of that show where ranman is actively trying to be female with make-up & mannerisms to trick someone for some reason, show is old and I was "new" to the extensive perversion of the japanese back then + had missed the opening. Fuck you r. takahashi).
